大雀蜂: (オオスズメバチ) - Asian giant hornet (Vespa mandarinia); yak-killer hornet
大雅: (だいが) - major festal song (subgenre of the Shi Jing)
大雨注意報: (おおあめちゅういほう) - storm warning
大雪: (ooyuki) - heavy snow; ""major snow"" solar term (aprox. 7 de dezembro)
大雪加: (オオセッカ) - Japanese marsh warbler (Megalurus pryeri)
大震: (たいしん) - violent earthquake; severe earthquake
大震法: (たいしんほう) - Large-Scale Earthquake Countermeasures Law
大霜降枝尺: (おおしもふりえだしゃく) - peppered moth (Biston betularia)
大静脈: (だいじょうみゃく) - vena cava
大面梟: (オオメンフクロウ) - masked owl (Tyto novaehollandiae); Australian masked owl
大韓帝国: (だいかんていこく) - Korean Empire (1897-1910)
大音声: (だいおんじょう) - very loud voice
大音量: (だいおんりょう) - very loud volume; megavolume
大音響: (だいおんきょう) - loud sound; loud reverberation
大頭: (おおあたま) - large head; person with a large head
大額: (おおびたい) - men's hairstyle with small sideburns and a wide forehead (Edo period)
大願: (たいがん) - ambition; the Buddha's great vow (to save all people)
大願成就: (だいがんじょうじゅ) - (yoji) realization of a great ambition; realisation of a great ambition
大風呂敷: (おおぶろしき) - (yoji) large furoshiki; big talk/vain boasting or bluster/blowing one's own trumpet/rodomontade
大風呂敷を広げる: (おおぶろしきをひろげる) - to talk big; to be bombastic
大食い: (おおぐい) - eating heavily/hearty eating/binge eating/gluttony; big eater/trencherman/gormandizer
大食家: (たいしょくか) - big eater; trencherman; glutton
大食漢: (たいしょくかん) - great eater; glutton
大食調: (たいじきちょう) - (in gagaku) scale similar to Mixolydian mode on E
大飯: (おおめし) - large meal; large meals
大饗: (おおあえ) - large banquet; court banquet (Heian period)
大馬鹿: (おおばか) - extreme foolishness; utter fool
大馬鹿者: (おおばかもの) - (yoji) great (utter) fool; complete idiot; absolute moron
大騒ぎ: (oosawagi) - clamor, barulho, alvoroço, tumulto, fúria, furor
大騒動: (だいそうどう) - great tumult; great strife; big loud bang; bustle; dirdum; hell broken loose; hell let loose; mighty whirl; tempest; whoopla
大骨: (おおぼね) - large bone; thick bone
大髭: (おおひげ) - long and abundant moustache
大鬚: (おおひげ) - long and abundant moustache
大鬼蓮: (おおおにばす) - royal water lily; water platter
大鮃: (オヒョウ) - halibut (esp. the Pacific halibut, Hippoglossus stenolepis)
大鰻: (オオウナギ) - giant mottled eel (Anguilla marmorata); marbled eel
大鱮: (オオタナゴ) - Acheilognathus macropterus (species of cyprinid)
大鳥: (おおとり) - large bird; (esp. 鵬)  peng (in Chinese mythology, giant bird said to transform from a fish); (esp. 鳳 and 凰 as male and female respectively)  fenghuang (Chinese phoenix)
大鵬: (たいほう) - dapeng (giant bird in Chinese mythology, similar to the roc or Garuda)
大鷲: (オオワシ) - Steller's sea eagle (Haliaeetus pelagicus)
大鷹: (オオタカ) - northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis); female hawk (or falcon); falconry (using a northern goshawk)
大鷹狩: (おおたかがり) - falconry (using a northern goshawk)
大鷹狩り: (おおたかがり) - falconry (using a northern goshawk)
大鹿: (オオジカ) - large deer; moose/elk/red deer
大麦若葉: (おおむぎわかば) - green barley; barley grass
大麻: (おおあさ) - hemp/cannabis; (たいま only) Shinto paper offerings
大麻取締法: (たいまとりしまりほう) - Cannabis Control Law
大麻蝿: (シマバエ) - lauxaniid fly (any fly of family Lauxaniidae); flesh fly (any fly of family Sarcophagidae)
大麻蠅: (シマバエ) - lauxaniid fly (any fly of family Lauxaniidae); flesh fly (any fly of family Sarcophagidae)
大黒: (だいこく) - god of wealth; monk's wife
大黒天: (だいこくてん) - Mahakala (incarnation of Mahesvara); Daikokuten (god of wealth)
大黒慈姑: (オオクログワイ) - Chinese water chestnut (Eleocharis dulcis var. tuberosa)
大黒柱: (だいこくばしら) - central pillar (of a building); mainstay (e.g. of an economy)/backbone (e.g. of a family)/provider/main man
大黒椋鳥擬: (オオクロムクドリモドキ) - common grackle (Quiscalus quiscula)
大黒黄金: (ダイコクコガネ) - horned dung beetle (Copris ochus)
大黒鼠: (ダイコクネズミ) - white rat; white rat that serves Daikoku (god of wealth)
天: (dez/ame) - heaven , sky; heaven; svarga (heaven-like realm visited as a stage of death and rebirth); deva (divine being of Buddhism)
天かす: (てんかす) - tenkasu; crunchy bits of deep-fried dough produced as a byproduct of cooking tempura
天から降りる: (てんからおりる) - to fall from heaven (the sky)
天が下: (あめがした) - the whole country; the public; the world; the ruling power; having one's own way
天こ盛: (てんこもり) - heap; pile; stack; spoonful; bowlful
天こ盛り: (てんこもり) - heap; pile; stack; spoonful; bowlful
天つゆ: (てんつゆ) - thin dipping sauce for tempura
天と地: (てんとち) - heaven and earth; top and bottom
天に二物を与えられた: (てんににぶつをあたえられた) - gifted with two things (usu. beauty and intelligence)
天に召される: (てんにめされる) - to die; to ascend to heaven
天に向かって唾を吐く: (てんにむかってつばきをはく) - to unintentionally harm oneself (while trying to cause harm to someone else); to spit into the sky
天に唾する: (てんにつばする) - to piss in the wind; to harm oneself in an attempt to harm someone else; to spit into the sky
天ぬき: (てんぬき) - tempura soba without the noodles; missing the vital element
天の一角: (てんのいっかく) - point of heaven; corner of the sky
天の下: (あめのした) - the whole country; the public; the world; the ruling power; having one's own way
